name: Tanks and Flying Fists 2: Joined Together
name_original: Tanks and Flying Fists 2: Joined Together
description:
A simple game built by 3 people. An "Ode to flash games". This is our FIRST EVER GAME. Super proud of what did in our time. Thanks to my friends. <3

Warning: Music is super loud. Sorry.

Note for the bomb: You must step on the bomb to gain access to the kick button!
Music Accreditation: Ben Sound. Fantastic website located here: https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/house
